mapper.insert: insert into t_goal_category(id, user_id, category_name) value (#{id}, #{userId}, #{categoryName})
insert into t_goal_item(id, user_id, goal_category_id, item_name) value (#{id}, #{userId} ,#{goalCategoryId}, #{itemName})
insert into t_goal_record(id, user_id, item_id, reach_quantity, reach_date, create_at) value (#{id}, #{userId}, #{itemId}, #{reachQuantity}, #{reachDate}, #{createAt})
insert into t_goal_tag(id, user_id, tag_name) value (#{id}, #{userId}, #{tagName})
insert into r_goal_item_tag(id, item_id, tag_id) value (#{id}, #{itemId} ,#{tagId})
mapper.select: select category_name, item_name, reach_quantity, reach_date, create_at from t_goal_item i LEFT JOIN t_goal_category c ON i.goal_category_id = c.id LEFT JOIN t_goal_record r ON item_id = i.id where i.user_id = #{userId}

select category_name, item_name, reach_quantity, reach_date from t_goal_record r JOIN t_goal_item i ON item_id = i.id JOIN t_goal_category c ON i.goal_category_id = c.id where r.user_id = #{userId} and category_name = #{categoryName}
